page.title: 03SURVEY OF HOUSES. 3.
page.content: {Terraced House.}My house is made of bricks and mortar.It has a new tiled roof with a brick chimney.There are eight windows with wooden frames around them.At the front of the house there is a wooden door with a brass knocker,a letter box and a door bell.The woodwork is painted white.There is a drainpipe at the front and back of the house.We have a small garden at the back. {Terrace Flat.} My terrace flat is above our newsagents shop.On the first floor there is a hall,the kitchen is on the right and straight ahead is the living room.At the top of the next flight of stairs there are three bedrooms and a bathroom with a toilet. At the side of the house there is a garage with the stock in it.
